entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning and 30 percent chance of rain showers this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4 with risk of frost. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4 with risk of frost. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
